project_plan.name: Weather Fetching CLI Application in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that retrieves and displays current weather information for a specified city using a public API.

task.name: Fetch weather data from the public API
Parse the fetched weather data to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions
Display temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal
Write tests for fetching and parsing the weather data
Execute tests on the implementation to ensure accurate data fetching and parsing
